title: Data Entry and Admin Specialist
job_overview:
We’re looking for a Data Entry Specialist to join our team full-time.

If you're detail-oriented, reliable, and comfortable working with spreadsheets and online tools, this role could be a great fit.

What You’ll Do:
- Enter, organize, and maintain data across spreadsheets and internal systems.
- Use tools like Microsoft Excel, Google Sheets, and other Microsoft Office apps for daily tasks.
- Ensure accuracy and consistency in all data entries.
- Assist with general administrative support as needed.
- Collaborate with the team to streamline data workflows and improve processes.

What You’ll Bring:
- Prior experience in data entry or administrative support.
- Strong knowledge of Microsoft Excel, Google Sheets, and the Microsoft Office suite.
- Ability to follow instructions with precision and work independently.
- Excellent organizational and time management skills.

Basic Requirements:
- Fluency in English (spoken and written).
- Willingness to learn and take on new tasks.
- Strong attention to detail.
- Preferred availability: Monday to Friday, 16:00 to 00:00 Philippines time.

 Compensation:
$400 USD/month (full-time, remote)

To apply:
Please send your resume to Upgrade to see actual info
Applicants without a resume will not be considered.
